Class BinaryServiceFilesystemImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.java.binarystore.filesystem.BinaryServiceFilesystemImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryService

    public class BinaryServiceFilesystemImpl
extends Object
implements BinaryService
    BinaryService implementation that uses local files system for persistence.
